items.title: Graphic design - The Quick Guide
items.headline: A quick guide for basic knowledge of graphic design.
objectives_summary: In this course, you will learn the basic concepts of graphic design.

In about 40 minutes of training, you will be able to build a solid base of knowledge that will help you to improve the quality of your work, or significantly improve your learning curve in your further studies.

visible_instructors.name: Patricia

items.headline: Master Color Theory from the ground up, improve your artwork ten-fold! Learn how to give intensity and mood to your Art.
objectives_summary: Understand Color and how to use it!
Create compelling moods and scenes using color.
Learn about Warm and Cold colors and when to use them.

items.title: Getting Started With Digital Painting Using Krita
items.headline: The complete beginners guide to the open-source digital painting software Krita.
objectives_summary: You will be able to start painting in Krita
You will become familiar with most of the powerful tools that Krita has to offer
You will know some useful shortcut keys to speed up your workflow

items.headline: I will make learning Photoshop easy and you'll pick up the basics in a flash!
objectives_summary: Use the basic Photoshop tools
Create headers, banners, lead images, thumbnails for their sites and social media profiles
Create a simple infographic using the basic Photoshop tools

items.title: Adobe Illustrator: How to Draw Squared Animals Icons

visible_instructors.name: Andrey
visible_instructors.title: Andrey Bzhitskikh
visible_instructors.job_title: Graphic Designer & Illustrator 20+ Years Industry Experience

items.headline: Graphic Design. The Complete Adobe Illustrator Course For Beginners and Advanced Designers. Drawing Animals Icons.
objectives_summary: This is a super simple and fun 30 minute class from which you will learn how to draw any animal in my style. I'm going to draw a lion. We'll start with a usual square and at the end of this class you will succeed fully finished, colored square animal! And you will learn the tips and techniques for using Adobe Illustrator tools to work effectively.

items.title: Drawing Cute Characters in Procreate
items.headline: Sketch, ink and color cute characters from scratch!
objectives_summary: Theory of cute: Techniques to apply when drawing cute characters
Basic drawing skills that cover line work, coloring and shading
Navigating and drawing in Procreate app for iPad Pro

items.title: Digital Design for Non-Designers
items.headline: Learn the basics of graphic design in the digital world, from technical aspects to creative elements
objectives_summary: How to Create Digital Graphics
Basic Image Copyright Information
Image File Type Differences

items.title: Essential Skills for Designers - Adobe Bridge
items.headline: The Hub of Your Creative Projects
objectives_summary: Learn how to make the most of Adobe Bridge, the file management application in the Creative Cloud
Learn how to organise your creative projects like a pro
Discover everything you need to know about the integration between Bridge and the other main Adobe design applications: Photoshop, Illustrator and InDesign

items.title: Design Your Own Fonts. Plus A Bunch Of Typography Secrets.
items.headline: Walk through all the steps of font creation. Learn how to choose a font with 100% confidence.
objectives_summary: Design fonts
Pick the most appropriate font for any project
Know some typography secrets

items.title: Typography 101: Picking the Right Fonts for Business Success

visible_instructors.name: Alexandra
visible_instructors.title: Alexandra Krieger
visible_instructors.job_title: Growing your Business | Online | Offline | Strategically

items.headline: Over 100,000 fonts are available! How do you choose the right one for your project? This course explains it all.
objectives_summary: Learn about the different font classifications - and I'll share my list of favorites in each category that will get you started
Learn the secrets that let you use typography to make your message shine
Learn which questions to ask BEFORE you start your design or layout project

items.title: Typography: Learn the Basics to Build a Solid Foundation
items.headline: Quick basics and quizzes to help you build a foundation in typography through understanding typefaces (fonts).
objectives_summary: Understand what the different categories of fonts are.
Recognize the differences between the various categories.
Know the histories of the different types and common usages.

items.title: How to Capture Emotions in Your Illustrations
items.headline: Learn to create emotional captivating illustrations by using things like values, lines, shapes and colors.
objectives_summary: After taking this class you will be equipped with various tools to to capture emotions in your illustrations which will create a connection between your work and your audience.  This ability will make your illustrations immediately more valuable.

to construct a sketch from ground up
